TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ActionEventArgs

summary.span: 提供有关 和 事件的数据。

span.span: Provides data for the and events.

summary.span: 此类型或成员只适合在 2007 Microsoft Office system 项目中使用。

span.span: This type or member is intended to be used only in projects for the 2007 Microsoft Office system.

summary.span: Office 2010 中已弃用智能标记。

span.span: Smart tags are deprecated in Office 2010..

Docs.summary:
获取已针对智能标记实现的所有属性。
Gets all properties that have been implemented for the smart tag. [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。.

value.span: 尚未实现智能标记的所有属性。

span.span: All properties that have been implemented for the smart tag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ISmartTagProperties`接口提供在 Microsoft Office 智能标记软件开发工具包 (SDK)。The `ISmartTagProperties` interface is provided in the Microsoft Office Smart Tag Software Development Kit (SDK). 若要使用此接口在代码中的，添加对的引用**Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag**从 **.NET**选项卡**添加引用**对话框。To use this interface in your code, add a reference to **Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag** from the **.NET** tab of the **Add Reference** dialog box. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates a handler for the event. 事件处理程序使用要从智能标记属性键控集合中获取属性值属性。The event handler uses the property to get a property value from the keyed collection of smart tag properties. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供接口。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. 此示例假定你已添加到的引用**Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag**从 **.NET**选项卡**添加引用**对话框。This example assumes that you have added a reference to **Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag** from the **.NET** tab of the **Add Reference** dialog box. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelDerivedSmartTags#3](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelDerivedSmartTags/CS/CustomSmartTag.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelDerivedSmartTags#3](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelDerivedSmartTags/VB/CustomSmartTag.vb#3)]

Docs.summary:
获取包含已识别为智能标记的文本的范围。
Gets the range containing the text that has been recognized as a smart tag. [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。.

value.span: 包含已被识别为智能标记的文本范围。

span.span: The range containing the text that has been recognized as a smart tag.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates a handler for the event. 事件处理程序使用属性显示的单元格包含识别的智能标记术语的地址。The event handler uses the property to display the address of the cell that contains the recognized smart tag term. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供接口。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#4](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/CS/Trin_ExcelSmartTags.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#4](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/VB/ThisWorkbook.vb#4)]

Docs.summary:
获取已识别为智能标记的文本。
Gets the text that was recognized as a smart tag. [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。.

value.span: 已识别为智能标记的文本。

span.span: The text that was recognized as a smart tag.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates a handler for the event. 事件处理程序使用属性修改操作的菜单标题。The event handler uses the property to modify the menu caption of the action. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供接口。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#3](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/CS/Trin_ExcelSmartTags.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#3](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/VB/ThisWorkbook.vb#3)]
